page.title: 01The Area in General.
page.content: The majority of the area covered is owned by{The Army}who let local farmers rent it for crops and grazing.It is known locally as{The {Range}and many people walk or ride horses out there.The fields are about 4 acres and are bounded by hedgerows. There are small patches of woodland of mostly planted trees with very few indigenous ones. Parts of Durrington,a fairly large village were included.The village has no centre and has grown a lot during the last five years.THe population at present is about 6000 people. The other built up area is Carter Barracks.This contained numerous Army Buildings and Housing. The{River Avon}flows through the area with a tributary known as the Nine Mile River.In many parts the landscape is very picturesque.
